name: Home Design - Dream Makeover
description:
Welcome to Home Design Dream Makeover! Pick a room, design & finish it with coins earned from playing the match-3 mini game. Once you've finished a room you can move on to the next. Choose from lots of beautiful designs & make your home something truly special!

Game Features:

Home Design: Many different items to choose from. Choose which lamp, door, wallpaper, couch, chair, etc. you want to make your home look special.

Match-3: Play the excitingly fun match-3 game where you'll be able to earn coins to purchase new items to make your home gorgeous!

Rooms: Lots of different rooms in your house to decorate! Kitchen, Lounge, Kid's room, Living Room, Bedroom & more!

Come play for free & see just how fun Home Design - Dream Makeover is!
